thread.title: Cult of creepy turkeys circling dead cat will freak you out
thread.title_full: Cult of creepy turkeys circling dead cat will freak you out | New York Post

author: Post Wires
title: Cult of creepy turkeys circling dead cat will freak you out
text:
These turkeys trying to give this cat its 10th life pic.twitter.com/VBM7t4MZYr 
— J… (@TheReal_JDavis) March 2, 2017 
Creepy footage of wild turkeys circling a dead cat in Boston has captivated the internet, and even bird nerds say they’re stumped about what their game is.
There’s no foul play — but it’s still a mystery.
“It’s certainly unusual,” said Debra Kriensky, a conservation biologist at New York City Audobon. “Circling in itself isn’t an unusual behavior for turkeys — the males sometimes circle females when getting ready to breed — it’s part of their behavioral repertoire, but it’s unusual to see so many circling a dead cat for example.”
The clip, posted by a Twitter user in Boston, shows dozens of the Thanksgiving icons slowly walking around the deceased kitty for a full 24 seconds, earning 330,000 views from freaked-out social media users.
